ProductInfo.Features:
Android 2.2 Froyo operating system - Allows you to stay connected and productive on the go
3G speed - Offers quick and easy connection speeds
Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n network - For Internet capability on the go (additional fees may apply). Wi-Fi hotspot capability provides a wireless Internet connection for compatible devices
Bluetooth 2.1 technology - With A2DP support enables simple wireless communication with a Bluetooth-enabled device
TFT capacitive touch screen - With 16M colors offers clear visibility that simplifies navigation of features
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Pro XT610 Unlocked GSM Android Cell Phone - Black
